DOC.brief_summary: This study is to find out care of critically ill patients enteral nutrition guidelines for the implementation of the effectiveness of the intervention.
DOC.brief_title: Care of Critically Ill Patients Enteral Nutrition Guidelines for the Implementation of the Effectiveness of the Intervention
DOC.criteria: ICU patients elder than 18 years of age (APACHE II) score > 15 Patients expected to remain in ICU for more than 2 days Patients that have consented to a DoNotResuscitate document Patients not expected survive more than 2 days Patients that have returned to ICU due to their condition worsening after previously leaving ICU Patients that have transferred from ICU of other hospitals.
